name: Firefly Escape! HD
description:
Basil the firefly has been captured by a sinister little girl, and trapped in the depths of a murky aquarium! Help our trapped friend make his way to the top, and out into the redeeming fresh air! You have to hurry though, as time is a precious commodity for fragile Basil. You are his only hope! Save him from the depths of the aquarium in Firefly Escape!

Play through 48 extremely exciting levels, spanning 3 different aquariums, with all kinds of obstacles blocking your path to freedom! Every level is unique and equally challenging, testing your wits on all occasions. Try and move as quickly as possible, all the while avoiding the dangers that lie ahead! Chock full of exciting action, Basil will need your help to return safely to the fresh air of freedom in this amazing puzzle adventure!

There's also iPhone version of this game! Check the App Store!

GAME FEATURES:
◇ Adorable main character, Basil!
◇ 48 exciting levels!
◇ 3 unique aquariums!
◇ Easy and convenient game controls!
◇ 10 different types of objects to help along the way!
◇ Stunning soundtrack and amazing visuals!
